summary: This is an internal FBI email discussing a FOIA request for the Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA). The FBI Government Information Specialist is seeking guidance from a Special Agent on whether releasing the NPA would impact ongoing investigations and outlines the process for potential release.

persons.name: Clemente
persons.context: Individual who filed the FOIA lawsuit (20-cv-1527) seeking documents related to Epstein, with a priority on the Non-Prosecution Agreement.

persons.name: Government Information Specialist
persons.context: FBI employee in the Litigation Support Unit, Information Management Division, corresponding with a Special Agent about processing the Epstein NPA for release in response to a FOIA lawsuit.

connections.description: The Government Information Specialist is seeking guidance and approval from the Special Agent regarding the handling of a FOIA request for the Epstein NPA.
Clemente is the plaintiff in a FOIA lawsuit against the FBI, and the Government Information Specialist is involved in processing the request for documents.

events.title: FOIA Lawsuit Filed - Clemente v. FBI
events.description: A FOIA lawsuit (20-cv-1527) is filed by Clemente against the FBI, seeking documents related to Jeffrey Epstein, with the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) being a prioritized request.

events.title: Previous FOIA Litigation - Radar Online
events.description: A previous FOIA lawsuit (17-cv-3956) related to Radar Online, where the FBI used exemption 7A to withhold the NPA and other documents from the Epstein case file.

keyFacts: The FBI is actively considering the release of the Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) in response to a FOIA lawsuit (20-cv-1527).
The FBI is concerned that releasing the NPA could impact ongoing investigations related to Epstein and his actions.
In a previous FOIA case (17-cv-3956), the FBI withheld the NPA and related documents using exemption 7A, which protects law enforcement records that could interfere with proceedings.
The internal email shows the FBI's deliberative process and caution regarding the public release of sensitive investigative materials related to Epstein.
